Articles.Content:
So yesterday I was driving my unmanned rover on Duna when it landed badly from a jump and broke a wheel. I right-clicked the wheel, and surprisingly, there was the option "repair wheel", even though the nearest Kerbal was 500km away at the Duna base. I clicked it and sure enough, the wheel popped back to its original shape and functioned properly! I broke the wheel on purpose again, and it worked again. This happened for all six wheels of the rover (the TR-2L Ruggedized ones). Did anyone else experience this? Did the rover's STEADLER Remote Guidance Unit finally become sentient, as its description claims?

Edit: No answers yet? I guess this is a unique glitch:)!

Edited June 23, 2015 by A35K
